Articles.Content: How about adding a tiny self inflating tent that can be carried on the backs of kerbals and you can deploy them on the surface of planets when you need to start a colony.
MKS has a small inflatable habitat. Though I'm not sure if it can be packed in with KIS/KAS.
Porkjet's habitat pack has an inflatable base that can be packed while deflated, although it says the volume is too big it still works.
